location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink on paper.Dimensions: 270 x 330mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map showing air routes over Saudi Arabia and Iraq. The map depicts three routes: route one (red line); route two (red line with short dashes); route three (dotted red line). In addition, there is an alternative route to route one, which takes the form of a red line with long dashes. The map also shows the surrounding area, i.e. the Persian Gulf and part of the Red Sea.
